name: CrossFire (itch) (AaronBacon)
description:
WIP: Being made for the Triple TriJam with the theme of "Chain Reaction"

Build 1 (Base Mechanics) is currently Uploaded

Build 2: Levels Designed, Game Functioning

Build 3: Art and polish will be uploaded within 24 hours of this post

The goal of this game will be to destroy all the enemy ships on screen with a single bullet to start the fight. Your goal is to make them all be caught in the crossfire and destroy each other.
